title: Easter attack : Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith meets Pope Francis in Vatican
content: A delegation of Sri Lankan Catholics led by Archbishop Cardinal Ranjith met with Pope Francis today in the Vatican.Following through with his promise to take Sri Lankaâ€™s grievances to the pope, archbishop Cardinal Ranjith hopes to work with the Vatican to advocate justice for the Easter Attack victims.The pope had written a letter to the cardinal back in January promising to keep a close watch on the situation and to lend whatever help he can to help the victims find justice.
